title: 1.8创意跑酷小游戏 苦力怕跑酷
author: shenyan
txt_content:
本帖最后由 shenyan 于 2014-12-7 10:58 编辑 

1.8创意跑酷小游戏~Creeper Jump Parkour~苦力怕跑酷~利用苦力怕的爆炸来帮助你实现各种跑酷~




关键是要掌握好距离。


The game is simple.
Step 1: Spawn a creeperStep 2: Aim yourself so that the creeper will blow you up and will give you a boost to the next blockStep 3: Blow the creeper upStep 4: Do it again


籽岷大大视频http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XODM1NzY5NTg0.html

replies.author: indefennu
replies.txt_content: 论苦力怕的重要性……对了我好想记得有人搬过？
